titles.title: Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts (DEFENSE) Act of 2018
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to improve the essential air service program.
Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts (DEFENSE) Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts (DEFENSE) Act of 2018
This bill allows an exemption from certain eligibility requirements under the essential air service program for certain locations for which not less than 10% of airport operations in 2017 were by aircraft of the Armed Forces.
